ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger Irish cream liqueur
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coffee flavored liqueur
des: "A rich, smooth and creamy taste! A slight twist on Irish Cream that everyone will enjoy!"
ins: Place ice in a short glass. Pour the Irish cream, butterscotch schnapps, and coffee liquor over the ice. Stir and serve.
